strings.s: Come here, baby... I'll give you what you want...
Hey... What... What the hell are you doing?
I'm doing exactly what you've been asking for... The way you've been exposing yourself to me... It's obvious you're craving for this...
No... I didn't ask for anything...
Come on... I know you're trying to make me go slower in the game by teasing me with this amazing body...
I loved your initiative, baby... Let me feel these titties of yours for a while... Don't you want to play another easy round?
No... Let me... go...
Yeah... Just hang in there a little more... You like my warm breath over your neck, don't you?
These tits feel so good... And your amazing ass rubbing on me... It's like my pants are going to explode...
Cut it out... It's enough...
Hey... Easy... This is getting so hot...
You need money right? How about I give you the next game prize without you even having to play?
What... What do you mean?
I mean this...
What the hel!?!
Come on... Give my boy down there a treat and I'll give a good prize...
Touch your... thing... for money?? How dare you...
I... I'm not a...
Oh, baby... I'm not calling you anything... Think of it as a simple exchange of favors... After all, you should know that my moves become super fast when I get such blue balls...
Now, come on... No one is watching... Just give me some good fun...
NO WAY
No... I can't do this... Just get off me...
Sigh... Such a tease...
Your loss, baby... Now my hands now feel faster than ever... Just try another round of bets to witness my true skill...
ACCEPT THE OFFER
I... I shouldn't, but... I need the money...
That's what I wanted to hear, baby... Now go ahead... Show me your true skill and you'll be well rewarded...
Oh boy... Such soft touch...
I... I can't beliebe I'm agreeing to this...
It's not like I never touch one of these anyways...
We're going to need some moves to make this work, baby...
Let'me show you...
Ahhh... You see what I'm talking about? I love fucking you little hand...
Oh baby... This is nice... I can spend hours like this...
What? No... Please... Just finish this already...
Well... If you want to speed this up, then how about help me a bit? I'd really appreciate...
Yeah, baby... That's it... You're the best...
I bet you're loving this country aren't you, baby? This is the place for you...
That's it... Hold it tight now!!!
Yeah... Thanks, baby... I needed that...
Just... Just get off me now...
Here... Take your prize... You definetively deserved it...
You know... A piece like you could make a lot of money around here like this...
I could be your... agent... It could be a dangerous line of work without a man to watch over you...
No... I... I just need to go now...
Goddamnit, You could have just pushed him away... Was that really necessary?
I'm... I'm sorry, But... I didn't have a choice... We need the money...
Sigh... There's always another way,
Jesus, Are you already having fun with the locals? Looks like you can't control yourself anymore...
I... wasn't having fun... I mean... I didn't have a choice... We need the money...
Yeah... Mixing pleasure and business sounds great, isn't?
